task.title: Drying Clothes in University Laundry Machines
task.shortdesc: University Housing offers all residents living on campus access to laundry facilities. Residents do not need to pay to use the machines

prereq.p: Residents must provide their own dryer sheets or wool balls if desired.

step.cmd: Load wet clothes into the dryer drum.
step.info: Alert: check the lint trap to ensure it is clean.

choices.choice: Optional: separate clothes based on color and/or fabric type.

step.cmd: Select the desired mode with the correct control panel
step.info: The right panel controls the bottom dryer and the left panel controls the top dryer.

postreq.p: Residents are encouraged to set a timer to keep track of time remaining on the machine. Remove all laundry promptly to allow others to use the machine.
Alert: Clean the lint trap when the cycle is finished to reduce the risk of fire.
